item.title: Plot Area Under the Curve with ggplot2
item.description: This is a very short post for a summary of the blog post, I will make a quick function for myself to graph some area under the curve for convenience. In this post, I will only use standard normal (dnorm) (may update in the future). R script can be found from my GitHub I will try to make customized function in the furture. library(ggplot2) auc <- function(limit, lower.tail = TRUE, between = TRUE){ bound <- c(-3.
